name: Yoga
info: Increased Strength: Various yoga poses involve weight-bearing exercises that help build strength in the muscles, including the core, arms, legs, and back.

name: Crying Training
info: Emotional Healing: Crying can be a part of the healing process, particularly during times of loss, heartbreak, or emotional pain. It allows us to acknowledge and process our emotions, facilitating emotional healing and growth.

name: Food Guidance
info: Eat a Variety of Nutrient-Dense Foods: Include a wide range of fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy fats in your diet. This ensures you get a diverse array of nutrients.

name: Health Care
info: Improved Mental Clarity and Focus: The combination of physical movement, breath control, and meditation in yoga helps to clear the mind, increase mental clarity, and improve focus and concentration.
